txt.en: This mirror stands alone in a terrible corrupted mire of passages, with the fungus creeping around it. You should tell someone at the Shadowed Refuge of the mirror you found in the deeps.
'My thanks, [placeholder]. It won't be long before something or other decides to fiddle with it again, I'm sure, but for the time being it's just a bit brighter down here, don't you think?'
'The dwarf-mirrors of Khazad-d√ªm will bring light back to these depths. Re-align the mirror on the northern shore of the lake.'
The mirror set within the Foundations of Stone is the sole source of pure light in these stygian depths. The evil things that creep about often ruin its alignment to restore the darkness.
Drafli is in the Shadowed Refuge in the western reaches of the Foundations of Stone.\n\nYou should tell Drafli that you have re-aligned the mirror.
